title: DjangoExercises

metadata.description: Learn about DjangoExercises with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Exercises
Test your Django skills with exercises from all categories:
Introduction
Get started
Virtual Environment
Installing Django
Creating Project
Creating Django App
Views
URLs
Templates
Models
Insert Data
Delete Data
Update Model
404 Template
Admin Create User
Admin Include Models
Variables
The If Tag
The For Tag
The Comment Tag
Include
Querysets
Queryset Get Data
Filter Querysets
Sort Querysets
Static Files
Collect Static Files
Global Static Files
Add CSS File

If you haven't already,

to become a W3Schooler, and get points for every exercise you complete.
As a logged on  user you will have access to many features like having
your own web page
,
track your learning progress
,
receive personal guided paths
, and
more
.
The Exercise
The exercises are a mix of "multiple choice" and "fill in the blanks" questions. 
There are between 3 and 9 questions in  each category.
The answer can be found in the corresponding tutorial chapter. If you're stuck, 
or answer wrong, you can try again or hit the "Show Answer" button to see the correct answer.
If you don't know Django, we suggest that you read our
Django Tutorial
from scratch.

★
+1

summary: This tutorial covers DjangoExercises concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use DjangoExercises effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of DjangoExercises and how to apply it in your projects.
